Colleen and her firm provided valuable services to me when I was transforming and building out my company's channel and alliance program. She brought relevant and detailed benchmark data to the initiative which guided us to a best-in-class organizational approach and the accompanying partner roles. Colleen added real, specific value. The work she produced was exceptional, delivered on time and at a reasonable cost. Colleen's greatest assest is herself. She collaborates with a senior team easily, providing insight and options without over- reaching her role as a consutltant or the job scope. She is a consumate professional and manages all client matters with the greatest care and discretion. The Caler Group stands out as a go to firm for those high tech companies seeking to expand or upscale their staff, or looking to transform their organizations into more effective, performance-based ones.
